Dear IA-Team,

whilest analysing the results of a previous crawl I decided =
to also
take a closer look at heritrix. To be more specific a closer look a=
t
the state heritrix was in after finishing the job.
(basically heritrix-1.=
12 with some minor patches running under java 1.6)

 following stats:

Memory
402591 KB used

3063488 KB =
max heap

Now this is quite a lot memory being used while sitting there idl=
e.
So I wondered what is eating up all my precious memory and this is
what =

ame

So what I'm=
 asking myself is: why do I still see about 5 million

ng finished about 3 days ago ?
